participants.name: Mary Ligon
participants.title: Director of Research and Development/NLP Trainer/Coach at Mary Ligon Company

messages.message: Thank you for connecting! I can read minds too!
Great to connect. Mind reading is a great idea for your next software. Please get my computer to read my mind and to be forgiving when I change my mind 5 times in 30 seconds:-)
Lol DARPA is already working on it ;)
Thanks for endorsing me for Web Development!
Thanks for endorsing me for Personal Transformation!
